Articles.Content:
There are quite a few tutorials on this one, but none of them hit the right spot in my personal style. So, I decided to make a new video tutorial on the subject:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XVwwzIHkySc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Here is the second part of this tutorial - How to land on and return safely from the Mun:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qD6rxtcJzQ0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
